combinationalAnalysis-input-name-list: Enter Input names separated by commas:
combinationalAnalysis-output-name-list: Enter Output names separated by commas:
combinationalAnalysis-enter-boolean-func: Enter Boolean Function:
combinationalAnalysis-need-decimal-colum: <label class='cb-checkbox'>I need a decimal column.<input id='decimalColumnBox' type='checkbox'></label>
combinationalAnalysis-alert-var-or-boole: Enter Input / Output Variable(s) OR Boolean Function!
combinationalAnalysis-alert-combinationa: Use Either Combinational Analysis Or Boolean Function To Generate Circuit!
tutorials-guide1-description: This is where you can find all the circuit elements that are offered to build amazing circuits.
tutorials-guide2-description: This panel lets you change element properties as they are selected. When no elements are selected, the panel displays project properties.
tutorials-quick-btn-description: This movable panel offers to perform some actions like Save Online, Open, Download quickly. Hover over the icons and see for yourself
tutorials-tabs-bar-description: This section displays all the circuits you have in your project. You can easily add and delete circuits.
tutorials-timing-diagram-panel-descripti: This panel displays the waveform created by circuits and can be used for resolving race conditions and debugging circuits.
tutorials-bug-guide-description: You can report any issues/bugs you face through this issue reporting button there and then quickly.
tutorials-tour-help-description: You can restart this tutorial anytime by clicking on "Tutorial Guide" under this dropdown.
ux-report-issue-success: You've successfully submitted the issue. Thanks for improving our platform.
ux-report-issue-failure: There seems to be a network issue. Please reach out to us at support@ciruitverse.org
circuit-error-delete-current-circuit: At least 2 circuits need to be there in order to delete a circuit.
circuit-alert-dependent-circuit:
The following circuits are depending on $1: $2
Delete subcircuits of $1 before trying to delete $1
circuit-delete-circuit-confirmation:
Are you sure want to delete: $1
This cannot be undone.
engine-cyclic-circuit-detection-error: Simulation Stack limit exceeded: maybe due to cyclic paths or contention
layoutMode-no-space-message: No space. Move or delete some nodes to make space.
restrictedElementDiv-element-restricted-: The element has been restricted by mentor. Usage might lead to deduction in marks
setup-restore-unsaved-data-message: We have detected that you did not save your last work. Don't worry we have recovered them. Access them using Project->Recover
subcircuit-error-insertion-in-wrong-mode: Subcircuit cannot be inserted in this mode
subcircuit-no-other-subcircuit-create-on: Looks like there are no other circuits which doesn't have this circuit as a dependency. Create a new one!
verilog2CV-code-error: There is some issue with the code
modules-Adder-tooltip-text: Adder ToolTip : Performs addition of numbers.
modules-AndGate-tooltip-text: And Gate Tooltip : Implements logical conjunction
modules-BitSelector-tooltip-text: BitSelector ToolTip : Divides input bits into several equal-sized groups.
modules-Buffer-tooltip-text: Buffer ToolTip : Isolate the input from the output.
modules-Button-tooltip-text: Button ToolTip: High(1) when pressed and Low(0) when released.
modules-ConstantVal-tooltip-text: Constant ToolTip: Bits are fixed. Double click element to change the bits.
modules-ControlledInverter-tooltip-text: Controlled Inverter ToolTip : Controlled buffer and NOT gate.
modules-Counter-tooltip-text: Counter: a binary counter from zero to a given maximum value
modules-Decoder-tooltip-text: Decoder ToolTip : Converts coded inputs into coded outputs.
modules-Demultiplexer-tooltip-text: DeMultiplexer ToolTip : Multiple outputs and a single line input.
modules-DigitalLed-tooltip-text: Digital Led ToolTip: Digital LED glows high when input is High(1).
modules-Flag-tooltip-text: FLag ToolTip: Use this for debugging and plotting.
modules-HexDisplay-tooltip-text: Hex Display ToolTip: Inputs a 4 Bit Hex number and displays it.
modules-ImageAnnotation-tooltip-text: Image ToolTip: Embed an image in the circuit for annotation
modules-Input-tooltip-text: Input ToolTip: Toggle the individual bits by clicking on them.
modules-LSB-tooltip-text: LSB ToolTip : The least significant bit or the low-order bit.
modules-MSB-tooltip-text: MSB ToolTip : The most significant bit or the high-order bit.
modules-Multiplexer-tooltip-text: Multiplexer ToolTip : Multiple inputs and a single line output.
modules-NandGate-tooltip-text: Nand Gate ToolTip : Combination of AND and NOT gates
modules-NorGate-tooltip-text: Nor Gate ToolTip : Combination of OR gate and NOT gate.
modules-NotGate-tooltip-text: Not Gate Tooltip : Inverts the input digital signal.
modules-OrGate-tooltip-text: Or Gate Tooltip : Implements logical disjunction
modules-Output-tooltip-text: Output ToolTip: Simple output element showing output in binary.
modules-PriorityEncoder-tooltip-text: Priority Encoder ToolTip : Compresses binary inputs into a smaller number of outputs.
modules-Rectangle-tooltip-text: Rectangle ToolTip : Used to Box the Circuit or area you want to highlight.
modules-RGBLed-tooltip-text: RGB Led ToolTip: RGB Led inputs 8 bit values for the colors RED, GREEN and BLUE.
modules-SevenSegDisplay-tooltip-text: Seven Display ToolTip: Consists of 7+1 single bit inputs.
modules-SixteenSegDisplay-tooltip-text: Sixteen Display ToolTip: Consists of 16+1 bit inputs.
modules-Splitter-tooltip-text: Splitter ToolTip: Split multiBit Input into smaller bitwidths or vice versa.
modules-SquareRGBLed-tooltip-text: Square RGB Led ToolTip: RGB Led inputs 8 bit values for the colors RED, GREEN and BLUE.
modules-Stepper-tooltip-text: Stepper ToolTip: Increase/Decrease value by selecting the stepper and using +/- keys.
modules-Text-tooltip-text: Text ToolTip: Use this to document your circuit.
modules-TriState-tooltip-text: TriState ToolTip : Effectively removes the output from the circuit.
modules-TwoComplement-tooltip-text: Two's Complement Tooltip : Calculates the two's complement
modules-VariableLed-tooltip-text: Variable Led ToolTip: Variable LED inputs an 8 bit value and glows with a proportional intensity.
modules-verilogDivider-tooltip-text: verilogDivider ToolTip : Performs addition of numbers.
modules-verilogMultiplier-tooltip-text: verilogMultiplier ToolTip : Performs addition of numbers.
modules-verilogPower-tooltip-text: verilogPower ToolTip : Performs addition of numbers.
modules-verilogShiftLeft-tooltip-text: verilogShiftLeft ToolTip : Performs addition of numbers.
modules-verilogShiftRight-tooltip-text: verilogShiftRight ToolTip : Performs addition of numbers.
modules-XnorGate-tooltip-text: Xnor Gate ToolTip : Logical complement of the XOR gate
modules-XorGate-tooltip-text: Xor Gate Tooltip : Implements an exclusive OR.
sequential-DflipFlop-tooltip-text: D FlipFlop ToolTip : Introduces delay in timing circuit.
sequential-Dlatch-tooltip-text: D Latch : Single input Flip flop or D FlipFlop
sequential-JKflipFlop-tooltip-text: JK FlipFlop ToolTip : gated SR flip-flop with the addition of a clock input.
sequential-RAM-prompt-enter-data: Enter Data (separated by space, comma, tab or newline) (data can be in hex, binary, octal or decimal)
sequential-SRflipFlop-tooltip-text: SR FlipFlop ToolTip : SR FlipFlop Selected.
sequential-TflipFlop-tooltip-text: T FlipFlop ToolTip :  Changes state / Toggles whenever the clock input is strobed.
data-project-no-project-saved: Looks like no circuit has been saved yet. Create a new one and save it!
data-project-project-saved: We have saved your project: $1 in your browser's localStorage
data-project-alert-unsaved-changes: You have unsaved changes on this page. Do you want to leave this page and discard your changes or stay on this page?
data-project-leave-page: Are u sure u want to leave? Any unsaved changes may not be recoverable
data-project-clear-project: Would you like to clear the project?
data-project-project-cleared: Your project is as good as new!
data-project-start-new-project: What you like to start a new project? Any unsaved changes will be lost.
data-save-login-first: You have to login to save the project, you will be redirected to the login page.
data-save-project-saved: We have saved your project: $1 in our servers.
data-save-project-save-fail: There was an error, we couldn't save to our servers
hotkey-binder-panel-ui-change-key-combin: Press Desire Key Combination & press Enter or press ESC to cancel.
hotkey-binder-KeyBinder-remove-custom-ke: Remove all custom keys & set the default keys?
hotkey-binder-KeyBinder-default-shortcut: The above combination is a system default shortcut & cannot be set.
hotkey-binder-actions-key-already-assign: This key(s) is already assigned to: $1, press Enter to override.
